an4.222:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam; bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.222:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.222:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.222:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo vinnunam; bahunca punnam pasavati”ti.
